entry.title: this love came back to me
entry.summary:
Author: anchrblack

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,618Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 184

Summary: Eddie inhales shakily over the phone. “I hate it here,” he whispers, and it sounds wrenched from the depths of his chest—dark and shameful. “I hate it here.” Buck’s heart twists. Eddie—he’s all alone, he’s got no one out there, no one to guard his back. He’s all alone. —eddie's alone in texas, and buck's never been good at letting him go.or,the one where buck follows eddie to texas.

entry.title: over the ocean call (brain's all out of sorts)
entry.summary:
Author: screamingcolours

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,009Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: “Hey Buck,” he says, smiling despite himself. He sits down on the couch and frowns at the tired lines on Buck’s face. “Sorry, just saw your texts, I called without thinking, but we can talk tomorrow if you were about to sleep.”“No, no don’t hang up, it’s nice to hear your voice.”“You sure?”“Always. Tell me about your day.”*OR they miss each other an insane (totally normal) amount

entry.title: The Chosen and the Cursed
entry.summary:
Author: ThisGayGeek22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,672Chapters: 6/15Kudos: 28

Summary: A solar eclipse marks the beginning.A fire changes everything.And one impossible moment shatters the illusion of normalcy.When Buck is gravely injured during a rescue, something ancient stirs—something buried deep in his blood. As his body begins to heal at a rate no doctor can explain, the 118 is pulled into a world of magic, secrets, and destiny.Eddie feels the shift too—power waking in his bones, in his blood. And the bond between him and Buck? It was never just friendship. Not really.As the veil between worlds thins, Buck and Eddie must confront the truth of who they are—what they were always meant to be—and the powerful connection tying them together.This was never just an accident.It was the beginning.

entry.summary:
Author: Bucklleydiaz

entry.title: The Wild Boy
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,610Chapters: 26/28Kudos: 663

Summary: The 118 get a call to some nearby woodlands where the police are waiting for their assistance. Athena tells them that they need to help with a little boy that had gotten his leg stuck in a beartrap. All seems simple but then she tells them that the boy is a feral child, animalistic and frightened, and was throwing rocks at people who tried to get closer. Buck and Eddie are tasked to get him to safety.The boy is scared of everything around him, people, sounds, objects, the wind, the smells. Terror is all the boy knew until he found something he wasn’t scared of.And its name was Evan Buckley. :3Warnings - Heavy descriptions of medical trauma, child abuse, neglect and injury.Queue found family, Christopher being an amazing big brother and the 118 being the best family in the entire world. :3

entry.title: A Keychain with the Number Three
entry.summary:
Author: James_Madison_617

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,848Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: Growing up, Buck just drifted through life. He would do the same thing every day over and over until the lines blurred and everything got fuzzy around the edges. That was until he discovered cutting. It didn't help much, but it got him through middle and high school, so what's so bad if he does it now?But Buck has this keychain. It's his own personal symbol to himself that he needs to stay clean. He told Chris that if he ever sees him without his keychain that he needed to tell his dad, but now that he hasn't been able to wear it in days, he's regretting that.
